entities.description: Indicates whether the respondent felt anxious as a symptom of sedative withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used sedatives to get over or avoid sedative withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used any prescription sedatives or other drugs to avoid having sedative withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Sedatives, tranquilizers, sleeping pills, or downers used by the respondent.
Indicates whether the respondent used sedatives/tranquilizers to get over or avoid sedative withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent used alcohol to get over or avoid sedative withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent has experienced anxiety as a sedative withdrawal symptom in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent used sedatives to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent used prescription drugs to avoid sedative withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent used sedatives/tranquilizers to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent used alcohol to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
